revised_title: Case Study: Jaundice Caused by a Stone in the Ductus Communis Bilarius
tldr: A case study of a patient with jaundice caused by a stone obstructing the ductus communis bilarius. The patient experienced relief after the stone was expelled through stool. This case suggests that exercise, such as riding in a coach, can help dislodge stones in some cases when other treatments fail.
